subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Connecticut (39-0) pulled away from Stanford to set up a championship game against Notre Dame (37-0). It will be the first N.C.A.A. women’s basketball final featuring two undefeated teams.
snippet: Connecticut (39-0) pulled away from Stanford to set up a championship game against Notre Dame (37-0). It will be the first N.C.A.A. women’s basketball final featuring two undefeated teams.
